content: preemie baby beanies i designed these tiny little hats based on the measurements given to me by a children s hospital nicu here in utah that i was knitting for they requested that the preemie hat be about 7 in circumference at the brim and 3- 3 1/2 from brim to crown yarn any fingering weight scraps uses approximately 11-12 gms about 45 yds needle size 2 9 circular or dpns co 72 using 9 circulars in size 2 needle………join to knit in round knit for approx 10 row 1 in k2p2 ribbing knit stockinette until 2 1/2 in length about 17 row start decreases as follows k6 k2tog 9 times all around knit row k5 k2tog 9 times all around knit row k4 k2tog 9 times all around knit row k3 k2tog 9 times all around knit row switch to 3 dpn s k2 k2tog 9 times all around knit row k1 k2tog 9 times all around knit row k2tog all around you should have 3 stitches on each of the 3 needles k1 k2 together so you now just have 2 stitches on each needle k2tog leaving you 3 stitches--put all on one needle and knit i-cord for 2 then run end of yarn down through the i-cord to inside center of hat and secure………tie i-cord in little knot at base of hat and weave end in at brim then hold to your heart and infuse with love & healing energy for the tiny person who will wear the beanie
